name: Stardust Sifr Divine Dragon
effectText:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 2+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
Must be Synchro Summoned. The first time each card you control would be destroyed each turn, by battle or card effect, it is not destroyed. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy 1 card on the field. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 8 or lower "Stardust" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
